content: sts along the top edge of the blanket knit 7 row bind off all sts on next row except leaving last st on the needle **do not cut yarn instead turn work and with rs facing pick up and knit 3 sts along the edge of the border plus 120 sts along the side edge of the blanket 124 sts on needle knit 7 row and bind off leaving last st on the needle repeat from ** once more more then for the last border side you will be picking up 4 sts along the beginning border as well 128 sts knit 7 row bobble all sts on next row weave in all ends ©2020 plymouth yarn company 061820jbt abbreviations k = knit k2tog = knit two together p = purl rs= right side st s = stitch es ws = wrong side yo = yarn over
